item.title: [KAFKA-7476] SchemaProjector is not properly handling Date-based logical types
item.description:
SchemaProjector is not properly handling Date-based logical types.  An exception of the following form is thrown:  

Caused by: java.lang.ClassCastException: java.util.Date cannot be cast to java.lang.Number
item.summary: SchemaProjector is not properly handling Date-based logical types

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
